alert.note: Alert for Broome; Cortland; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:04PM EDT until July 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BROOME...SOUTHERN CORTLAND...NORTHERN TIOGA AND SOUTHEASTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 403 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harford to near Spencer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caroline, Berkshire, Richford, Harford, Marathon, Lapeer, South Danby, Brooktondale, Slaterville Springs and Willseyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
